entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023
